title: LDS MORMON howto export ebooks from Infobase Gospelink Library
description:
See torrent for more detailed instructions.  NO DRM REMOVAL REQUIRED!

1.  Purchase LDS Library 2005 or 2006  
2.  Purchase LDS PDA library 
3.  Install both programs on windows xp or xp mode in Windows 7 Pro
4.  Launch LDS library and select a book
5.  Select tools, pda partner, create title
6.  Step 5 creates a .htm file on your PC.  Locate that file.
7. Download Calibre or any other free ebook converter
8.  Drag and drop the file into Calibre and select convert.  Choose .mobi for kindle or .epub for other reader.



by purchasing these items used on amazon, one may acquire 3600 book for $15
